articles.author: J.J. Cooper
articles.title: Spencer Jones Remains MLB’s Most Perplexing Prospect - Baseball America
articles.description: J.J. Cooper explains why Spencer Jones, even with his incredible power surge in Triple-A for the Yankees, remains a tough prospect nut to crack.
